text: Micheline Borghs (born 17 May 1956) is a Belgian fencer. She competed in the women's individual foil events at the 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. == References == Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian female fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Belgium Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Antwerp
title: Micheline Borghs
